圍.definition: to encircle; to surround; all around; to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)

圍剿.definition: to encircle and annihilate; refers to repeated campaigns of the Guomindang against the communists from 1930 onwards

圍坐.definition: to sit in a circle; seated around (a narrator)

圍城打援.definition: to besiege and strike the relief force (idiom); strategy of surrounding a unit to entice the enemy to reinforce, then striking the new troops

圍場.definition: enclosure; pig pen; hunting ground exclusively kept for emperor or nobility (in former times)

圍場滿族蒙古族自治縣.pinyin: Wei2 chang3 Man3 zu2 Meng3 gu3 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4
圍場滿族蒙古族自治縣.definition: Weichang Manchu and Mongol autonomous county in Chengde 承德[Cheng2 de2], Hebei

圍場縣.definition: Weichang Manchu and Mongol autonomous county in Chengde 承德[Cheng2 de2], Hebei

圍堵.definition: to blockade; to surround; to hem in

圍捕.definition: to fish by casting a net; to capture; to surround and seize

圍攻.definition: to besiege; to beleaguer; to attack from all sides; to jointly speak or write against sb

圍爐.definition: to gather around the stove; (Tw) to come together for a family dinner on Chinese New Year's Eve

圍網.definition: seine net; wire mesh fence; fence screen

圍繞.definition: to revolve around; to center on (an issue)

圍觀.definition: to stand in a circle and watch

圍起.definition: to surround; to encircle; to enclose; to fence in

圍魏救趙.definition: lit. to besiege 魏[Wei4] and rescue 趙|赵[Zhao4] (idiom); fig. to relieve a besieged ally by attacking the home base of the besiegers
